title: Copa Sudamericana: River Plate defeats Chapecoense 3-1 (CONMEBOL - Confederación Sudamericana de Fútbol)
text: ( Source : CONMEBOL - Confederación Sudamericana de Fútbol ) River Plate defeated Brazil 's Chapecoense 3-1 (1-1) Wednesday night in the first leg for the quarterfinals of the 2015 Copa Sudamericana played at the Monumental stadium in Buenos
